FeedItemCard.signInToLikeToast: You must be signed in to like a post
FeedItemCard.signInToVoteToast: You must be signed in to vote

CreatePostModal.title: Create a new post
CreatePostModal.description: Share an update, ask a question, or start a conversation with the community
CreatePostModal.pollOptionsError: A poll must have at least 2 non-empty options

tooltip.onlineSynced: You are online and all changes are synced.
tooltip.offline: You are offline. {count, plural, =0 {No pending changes.} =1 {1 change is queued.} other {{count} changes are queued.}}

offline.title: You are offline.
offline.description: Your changes will be saved and synced when you reconnect.

synced.title: Sync complete
synced.description: All your offline changes have been saved.

syncFailed.title: Sync failed
syncFailed.description: We could not sync your offline changes. We will try again later.

queued.title: Action queued
queued.description: This action will be performed when you are back online.

hero.title: Empowering Agriculture from Soil to Sale on {appName}
hero.subtitle: The single platform connecting every stakeholder in the agricultural value chain for a more transparent, efficient, and sustainable future.

features.title: DamDoh's Main Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to grow, connect, and trade, all in one place.

networking.title: Intelligent Networking
networking.description: AI-powered connection suggestions to link you with the right partners, from suppliers to international buyers.

marketplace.title: Direct Marketplace
marketplace.description: Buy and sell products and services directly, increasing transparency and profitability for all stakeholders.

forums.title: Topical Forums
forums.description: Share knowledge, discuss challenges, and collaborate on solutions in topic-specific forums.

talent.title: Talent Exchange
talent.description: Offer or find specialized agricultural services, from on-demand harvesting to drone surveys.

forWho.title: One Platform for the Entire Value Chain
forWho.description: DamDoh is uniquely designed to serve the entire agricultural ecosystem, creating a single point of truth and opportunity for all.

farmers.title: Farmers
farmers.description: Access better markets, find quality inputs, and get expert advice to increase yield and profitability.

buyers.title: Buyers & Processors
buyers.description: Source high-quality, traceable produce directly from growers and co-ops, ensuring supply chain reliability.

experts.title: Experts & Service Providers
experts.description: Offer your specialized skills and services to a wide agricultural audience seeking your expertise.

forWho.imageAlt: A diverse group of agricultural stakeholders collaborating

cta.title: Join the Agricultural Revolution
cta.subtitle: Sign up today and become part of a growing global network dedicated to transforming the future of food.

Auth.signUpDescription: Enter your details to get started.
Auth.signInDescription: Enter your credentials to access your account.
Auth.forgotPasswordDescription: No worries, we'll send you reset instructions.

forgotPassword.emailSentDescription: A password reset link has been sent to {email}.
forgotPassword.emailSentDescriptionIfAccountExists: If an account with {email} exists, a password reset link has been sent.
forgotPassword.successDescription: Please check your inbox (and spam folder) for the password reset link.

errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later.

Auth.resetPasswordPrompt: Set a new password for your {appName} account
Auth.resetPasswordDescription: Enter a new secure password for your account.

resetPassword.successDescription: You can now sign in with your new password.
resetPassword.successRedirect: You will be redirected to the sign in page shortly.

errors.missingCode: Invalid password reset link. Please request a new one.
errors.missingCodeDescription: The password reset link is missing or invalid. Please return to the forgot password page to request a new one.
errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.invalidOrExpiredCode: The password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.userDisabled: This user account has been disabled.
errors.userNotFound: No user found corresponding to this reset link.
errors.weakPassword: The new password is not strong enough.

recoverPage.title: Account Recovery
recoverPage.description: Regain access to your account with the help of a trusted friend.
recoverPage.step1: Enter your phone number to start a recovery session.
recoverPage.step2: Show the generated QR code to a trusted friend who also uses DamDoh.
recoverPage.step3: Your friend scans the code with their app to confirm your identity.
recoverPage.scanDescription: Let a trusted connection in your DamDoh network scan this QR code to verify your identity.
recoverPage.scanNote: This code is temporary and will expire in 10 minutes.

networkPage.title: Stakeholder Network
networkPage.description: Discover and connect with farmers, buyers, service providers, and experts across the agricultural value chain.
networkPage.aiSuggestionsDescription: Based on your profile, here are some people you might want to connect with.
networkPage.browseAllDescription: Use the filters below to find specific people or businesses in the network.
networkPage.noStakeholdersHint: Try adjusting your search filters or check back later.

toast.noSuggestions: No new suggestions available at this time.

networkPage.noSuggestions: No suggestions available at this time. Complete your profile for better recommendations.

myNetworkPage.connectionsDescription: These are your approved connections on the platform. You can now message them directly.
myNetworkPage.noConnections: You haven't made any connections yet. Start exploring the network!
myNetworkPage.requestsDescription: Review and respond to pending connection requests.
myNetworkPage.noRequests: You have no pending connection requests.

agentToolsPage.accessDeniedDescription: You do not have the required permissions to access these tools.
agentToolsPage.title: Field Agent Tools
agentToolsPage.description: Tools for authorized agents to assist and manage users in the field.
agentToolsPage.resultsPlaceholder: User details will appear here after a successful search.

hub.title: Farm Management Hub
hub.description: Your central dashboard for all on-farm activities, from managing plots and crops to tracking inputs and labor.

myFarms.title: My Farms & Crops
myFarms.description: Define your farm plots, log crops, track planting cycles, and manage harvest data.

labor.title: Labor Management
labor.description: Keep track of your farm workers, log their hours, and record payments all in one place.

knf.title: KNF Inputs Assistant
knf.description: Create and manage your homemade Korean Natural Farming inputs like FPJ, FAA, and more.

fgw.title: Farming God's Way
fgw.description: Learn and apply the core principles of FGW for sustainable, high-yield results.

financials.title: Financials
financials.description: Track your farm's income and expenses, analyze profitability, and apply for financing.

seedStarting.title: Seed Starting Guide
seedStarting.description: Learn best practices for starting seeds indoors to get a head start on the season.

familyFarm.title: 200sqm Family Farm
familyFarm.description: Explore a model for a self-sufficient, integrated family farm on just 200 square meters.

assetManagement.title: Asset Management
assetManagement.description: Log and track your farm machinery, tools, and other valuable assets. (Coming Soon)

myFarms.title: My Farms
myFarms.noFarmsDescription: Get started by adding your first farm profile.

auth.title: Please Sign In
auth.description: You need to be logged in to view your farms.

createFarm.title: Register a New Farm
createFarm.description: Provide the details for a new farm you own or manage.

form.locationDescription: Provide the city, region, or general area.
form.descriptionPlaceholder: A short description of your farm, its primary activities, or its mission.
form.irrigationDescription: List the primary irrigation methods used.

toast.authErrorDescription: You must be logged in to create a farm.
toast.successDescription: {farmName} has been successfully added to your profile.

editFarm.title: Edit Farm Details
editFarm.description: Update the information for your farm.

toast.loadError: Could not find the farm you are trying to edit.

crops.title: Crops & Batches
crops.description: Manage all active and past crops on this farm.
crops.noCrops: No crops have been logged for this farm yet.

insights.title: Profitability Insights
insights.description: AI-powered analysis of your farm activities.
insights.noInsights: Log more activities like harvests and input applications to generate insights.

notFound.title: Farm Not Found
notFound.description: We couldn't find the farm you were looking for.

createCrop.title: Log a New Crop
createCrop.description: Record a new crop or batch being planted on this farm to start tracking its journey.
createCrop.notesPlaceholder: Add any additional notes about this batch, such as seed variety or field location.

toast.authErrorDescription: You must be logged in to add a crop.
toast.failDescription: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

editCrop.title: Edit Crop
editCrop.description: Update the details for this crop or batch.

toast.loadError: Could not load the crop you are trying to edit.

cropDetailPage.noActivities: No activities have been logged for this crop yet.

toast.loadError: Could not load crop data. Please try again.

logHarvest.title: Log Harvest for {cropType}
logHarvest.description: Record the details of your harvest. This will create a new traceable batch (VTI) on the DamDoh platform.
logHarvest.notesPlaceholder: Add notes on this harvest, like weather conditions or techniques used.

offlineToast.title: Offline Mode: Harvest Queued
offlineToast.description: Your harvest log has been saved and will be synced to create a VTI when you are back online.

success.title: Harvest Logged & VTI Created!
success.description: Your harvest for {cropType} has been recorded. Your new VTI is {vtiId}.
success.successCardDescription: A new traceable batch has been created for your {cropType} harvest. You can now view the traceability report or create a marketplace listing.

logInput.title: Log Input Application
logInput.description: Record the application of fertilizers, pesticides, KNF inputs, or other substances to your crop.
logInput.useKNFPlaceholder: Select from your ready KNF inputs...

toast.authErrorDescription: You must be logged in to log an application.
toast.description: The input application has been successfully added to your crop's journey.

logObservation.title: Log an Observation
logObservation.description: Log a general observation, a soil test result, or note a potential pest or disease issue. Upload a photo for AI-powered diagnosis.
logObservation.detailsPlaceholder: Describe what you observed in detail. If you see a pest or disease, describe its appearance, location on the plant, and extent of the issue.
logObservation.uploadDescription: A photo can help with diagnosis. It will be analyzed by AI if provided.

toast.authErrorDescription: You must be logged in to log an observation.
toast.aiDescription: Your image data is being sent to the AI for diagnosis.
toast.aiCompleteDescription: The diagnosis has been included in your observation log.
toast.aiFailDescription: We could not analyze the image. The observation will be saved without AI diagnosis.
toast.successDescription: Your observation has been successfully logged.

laborPage.title: Labor Management
laborPage.description: Manage your workforce, track hours, and log payments efficiently.
laborPage.noWorkers: No workers have been added yet. Click 'Add Worker' to start.

toast.fetchWorkersError: Could not fetch your list of workers.
toast.paymentLoggedDescription: The payment has been recorded and an expense entry was created in your financials.

workerDetailPage.notFoundDescription: The worker you are looking for does not exist.
workerDetailPage.noWorkLogs: No work hours have been logged for this worker.
workerDetailPage.noPayments: No payments have been logged for this worker.

FeedItemCard.signInToLikeToast: Vous devez être connecté pour aimer une publication
FeedItemCard.repostPlaceholderToast: La fonctionnalité de repartage sera bientôt disponible !
FeedItemCard.signInToVoteToast: Vous devez être connecté pour voter

CreatePostModal.title: Créer une nouvelle publication
CreatePostModal.description: Partagez une mise à jour, posez une question ou démarrez une conversation avec la communauté
CreatePostModal.pollOptionsError: Un sondage doit avoir au moins 2 options non vides
CreatePostModal.emptyPostError: Votre publication ne peut pas être vide

tooltip.onlineSynced: Vous êtes en ligne et toutes les données sont synchronisées.
tooltip.offline: Vous êtes hors ligne. {count} actions en file d'attente.

online.title: Vous êtes de nouveau en ligne !

offline.title: Vous êtes actuellement hors ligne
offline.description: Vos modifications seront enregistrées localement et synchronisées lorsque vous vous reconnecterez.

syncing.title: Synchronisation des données
syncing.description: Envoi de {count} actions hors ligne au serveur.

synced.title: Synchronisation Terminée
synced.description: Vos modifications hors ligne ont été enregistrées avec succès.

syncFailed.title: Échec de la Synchronisation
syncFailed.description: Impossible de synchroniser vos modifications hors ligne. Nous réessaierons plus tard.

queued.title: Action Mise en File d'Attente
queued.description: Cette action sera effectuée lorsque vous serez de nouveau en ligne.

Auth.signInDescription: Entrez vos identifiants pour accéder à votre compte.
Auth.recoverWithUniversalIdPrompt: Récupérer le compte avec l'ID Universel
Auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Pas de soucis, nous vous enverrons des instructions de réinitialisation.
Auth.rememberPasswordPrompt: Vous vous souvenez de votre mot de passe ?

forgotPassword.emailSentDescription: Un lien de réinitialisation de mot de passe a été envoyé à {email}.
forgotPassword.emailSentDescriptionIfAccountExists: Si un compte avec {email} existe, un lien de réinitialisation de mot de passe a été envoyé.
forgotPassword.successDescription: Veuillez vérifier votre boîte de réception (et le dossier spam) pour le lien de réinitialisation de mot de passe.

errors.unexpected: Une erreur inattendue est survenue. Veuillez réessayer.
errors.tooManyRequests: Trop de demandes. Veuillez réessayer plus tard.
errors.default: Échec de l'envoi de l'e-mail de réinitialisation

Auth.resetPasswordPrompt: Définissez un nouveau mot de passe pour votre compte {appName}
Auth.resetPasswordDescription: Entrez un nouveau mot de passe sécurisé pour votre compte.

resetPassword.successTitle: Mot de passe réinitialisé avec succès !
resetPassword.successDescription: Vous pouvez maintenant vous connecter avec votre nouveau mot de passe.
resetPassword.successRedirect: Vous allez être redirigé vers la page de connexion sous peu.

errors.missingCode: Lien de réinitialisation de mot de passe invalide. Veuillez en demander un nouveau.
errors.missingCodeDescription: Le lien de réinitialisation de mot de passe est manquant ou invalide. Veuillez retourner à la page 'Mot de passe oublié' pour en demander un nouveau.
errors.unexpected: Une erreur inattendue est survenue. Veuillez réessayer.
errors.invalidOrExpiredCode: Le lien de réinitialisation de mot de passe est invalide ou a expiré. Veuillez en demander un nouveau.
errors.userDisabled: Ce compte utilisateur a été désactivé.
errors.userNotFound: Aucun utilisateur trouvé correspondant à ce lien de réinitialisation.
errors.weakPassword: Le nouveau mot de passe n'est pas assez fort.
errors.default: Échec de la réinitialisation du mot de passe

recoverPage.title: Récupération de Compte
recoverPage.description: Récupérez l'accès à votre compte avec l'aide d'un ami de confiance.
recoverPage.step1: Entrez votre numéro de téléphone pour démarrer une session de récupération.
recoverPage.step2: Montrez le code QR généré à un ami de confiance qui utilise également DamDoh.
recoverPage.step3: Votre ami scanne le code avec son application pour confirmer votre identité.
recoverPage.scanDescription: Demandez à une connexion de confiance de votre réseau DamDoh de scanner ce code QR pour vérifier votre identité.
recoverPage.scanNote: Ce code est temporaire et expirera dans 10 minutes.

networkPage.title: Réseau des Acteurs
networkPage.description: Découvrez et connectez-vous avec des agriculteurs, des acheteurs, des prestataires de services et des experts de toute la chaîne de valeur agricole.
networkPage.aiSuggestionsDescription: Basé sur votre profil, voici quelques personnes avec qui vous pourriez vouloir vous connecter.
networkPage.browseAllDescription: Utilisez les filtres ci-dessous pour trouver des personnes ou des entreprises spécifiques dans le réseau.
networkPage.noStakeholdersHint: Essayez d'ajuster vos filtres de recherche ou revenez plus tard.

toast.loadError: Impossible de charger les données du réseau.
toast.noSuggestions: Aucune nouvelle suggestion disponible pour le moment.

networkPage.noSuggestions: Aucune suggestion disponible pour le moment. Complétez votre profil pour de meilleures recommandations.

myNetworkPage.connectionsDescription: Ce sont vos connexions approuvées sur la plateforme. Vous pouvez maintenant leur envoyer des messages directement.
myNetworkPage.noConnections: Vous n'avez encore établi aucune connexion. Commencez à explorer le réseau !
myNetworkPage.requestsDescription: Examinez et répondez aux demandes de connexion en attente.
myNetworkPage.noRequests: Vous n'avez aucune demande de connexion en attente.

toast.loadError: Impossible de charger les données du réseau.
toast.respondError: Impossible de répondre à la demande.

agentToolsPage.accessDeniedDescription: Vous ne disposez pas des autorisations nécessaires pour accéder à ces outils.
agentToolsPage.title: Outils d'Agent de Terrain
agentToolsPage.description: Outils pour les agents autorisés afin d'assister et de gérer les utilisateurs sur le terrain.
agentToolsPage.findUserLabel: Trouver un Utilisateur par Numéro de Téléphone
agentToolsPage.phoneRequiredError: Le numéro de téléphone est requis.
agentToolsPage.resultsPlaceholder: Les détails de l'utilisateur apparaîtront ici après une recherche réussie.

laborPage.title: Gestion de la Main-d'œuvre
laborPage.description: Gérez votre main-d'œuvre, suivez les heures et enregistrez les paiements efficacement.
laborPage.noWorkers: Aucun travailleur n'a encore été ajouté. Cliquez sur 'Ajouter un Travailleur' pour commencer.

toast.fetchWorkersError: Impossible de récupérer votre liste de travailleurs.
toast.nameRequired: Le nom du travailleur est requis.
toast.paymentLoggedDescription: Le paiement a été enregistré et une entrée de dépense a été créée dans vos finances.

workerDetailPage.backLink: Retour à la Gestion de la Main-d'œuvre
workerDetailPage.notFoundDescription: Le travailleur que vous recherchez n'existe pas.
workerDetailPage.noWorkLogs: Aucune heure de travail n'a été enregistrée pour ce travailleur.
workerDetailPage.noPayments: Aucun paiement n'a été enregistré pour ce travailleur.

toasts.loadError: Impossible de charger les détails du travailleur.
